review: Disappointed. It continuously states I have a low Internet speed, when I have a 20 MB download speed (confirmed with speed test.)  Very frustrating to watch shows when the Fire Stick has to download, play and download more. My Roku has no issue. I cannot recommend the Fire Stick.

review: Got this as a gift and the person loves it. Streams tv shows great, wish it had as much power as amazon tv but this costs less and is small. I wish amazon showed in all the pictures that this needed a charger that sticks out the side as they want you to think you just plug in the HDMI and you're good but in reality you need a big charging brick also... plus they recommend extra cord for use as a wifi antenna...
